ipxact:register.ipxact:name: FRCC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: FRCC Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRCC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Free Running Clock Counter. Counts the number of core cycles.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PROF_CNTx
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: PROF CNTx Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNTx
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter X X = 0 through 7

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DBG_RC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: AXI Master Port Read/Write Counter Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WRC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI Master Port write response counter. Status indication for the write response.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RBC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI Master Port read burst counter. Status indication for the read burst.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RDCHKSUM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Checksum Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CHKSUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Checksum of the source data. The DMA caclulates a checksum of the data read from the source memory. The checksum is sampled into CHKSUM when the last read data is received by the DMA.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: BYPASS_BRESP
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Write Response Bypass Configuration Register Note: BYPASS_BRESP must not be modified when the DMA is active.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BYPASS_IMI_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write Response Bypass Enable on IMI 0 : Write response is from the IMI bus 1 : Write response bypass is enabled. The DMA generates AND(IMI_WVALID, IMI_WREADY, IMI_WLAST) and routes it to IMI BVALID after BYPASS_IMI_DLY cycles. BRESP is set to 2'b00 (OKAY). IMI BREADY is asserted constantly.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BYPASS_IMI_DLY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: IMI Write Response Bypass Delay. See BYPASS_IMI_EN.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BYPASS_EMI_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write Response Bypass Enable on EMI 0 : Write response is from the EMI bus 1 : Write response bypass is enabled. The DMA generates AND(EMI_WVALID, EMI_WREADY, EMI_WLAST) and routes it to EMI BVALID after BYPASS_EMI_DLY cycles. BRESP is set to 2'b00 (OKAY). EMI BREADY is asserted constantly.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BYPASS_EMI_DLY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: EMI Write Response Bypass Delay. See BYPASS_EMI_EN.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_PAUSE_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Pause Status Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_PAUSE_SOURCE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates initial source of DMA pause: 000: DMA is not paused 001: DMA pause by breakpoint 011: DMA pause by writing DMA_PAUSE All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_PAUSE_STATUS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates if the DMA is paused or unpaused (by any source): 0: DMA is not paused 1: DMA is paused

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_STRTTSK
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Shadow Start Task Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_STRTTSK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When writen with 1, the DMA pushes the DTC shadow registers to the DTC active registers and starts the transfer. Writing 0 has no effect. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after being written.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_PAUSE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Pause Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_PAUSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Pause all DMA transfers. When 1 is written to this field, the DMA completes burst access to external memory and pending internal memory accesses that have already started, and does not issue new requests. Normal operation is resumed when the DMA is unpaused. This field is cleared automatically by the HW.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_UNPAUSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Unpause all DMA transfers. If the DMA pause state was caused by writing DMA_PAUSE, the DMA resumes transfers when 1 is written to this field. This field is cleared automatically by the HW.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_DDQS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Status Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMAIDLE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA Idle: 0: DMA is performing a transfer. 1: DMA is in IDLE state, which means that all of the following are true: - The DMA queue and shadow are empty. - The DMA is not paused. - The DMA FIFO is empty. - For data compression/decompression tasks, CDU is idle (applicable if CDU is installed). This bit is used for software DMA clock shutdown. When this bit is set to 0, it is not allowed to switch the DMA clock off.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AXIERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set when RRESP/BRESP responds with SLVERR or DECERR. This bit is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_DDQC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Control Register The user must not change DMA_DDQC while a DMA transfer is active.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MAX_WOS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum number of write bursts that can be outstanding on the AXI 00: 8 write bursts 01: 16 write bursts 10: 32 write bursts 11: 64 write bursts

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MAX_ROS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum number of read bursts that can be outstanding on the AXI 00: 8 read bursts 01: 16 read bursts 10: 32 read bursts 11: 64 read bursts

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BPMASK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Breakpoint Mask Determines if the DMA pauses when receiving a breakpoint request: 0: Breakpoint request is masked. 1: The DMA pauses upon breakpoint request.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_IRQ
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Interrupt Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DDMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data interrupt. This bit is set if any of the allocated bits in DMA_IRQ is set. 0 : No interrupt pending 1 : Interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DDMA_IRQ_SOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data SOT DMA interrupt. 0 : no SOT DMA interrupt pending 1 : SOT DMA interrupt pending This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DDMA_IRQ_EOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data EOT DMA interrupt. 0 : no EOT DMA interrupt pending 1 : EOT DMA interrupt pending This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_IRQ_S
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA_IRQ Error Injection Register Access control by DMAACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DDMA_IRQ_SOT_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert DDMA_IRQ_SOT in the DMA_IRQ register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DDMA_IRQ_EOT_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert DDMA_IRQ_EOT in the DMA_IRQ register.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_ADDR_BND
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Address Boundary Register The user must not change DMA_ADDR_BND while a DMA transfer is active.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_IMI_ADDR_BND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Highest address that DMA can access on IMI interface. The highest addres is (DMA_IMI_ADDR_BND * 16 KB)-1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_EMI_ADDR_BND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine DMAs:Highest address that DMA can access on EMI interface. The highest addres is (DMA_EMI_ADDR_BND * 1 MB)-1. System DMAs:Highest address that DMA can access on EMI interface. The highest addres is (DMA_EMI_ADDR_BND * 256 MB)-1.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMAERR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Errors Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMAE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Accumulative indication. This bit is set when any of the allocated bits in DMAERR are set. 0: No error pending 1: Error pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_IMI_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit is set if the DMA generates an IMI access with an address greater than or equal to DMA_IMI_ADDR_BND. 0: No error pending 1: Error pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_EMI_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit is set if the DMA generates an EMI access with an address greater than or equal to DMA_EMI_ADDR_BND. 0: No error pending 1: Error pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_AXIERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication was received from the AXI bus. 0: No error pending 1: Error pending

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMAERR_M
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Errors Mask Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMAE_M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit is a mask for DMAE in the DMAERR register. 0: This field is not masked in the DMAERR register 1: This field is masked in the DMAERR register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_IMI_OOR_M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit is a mask for DMA_IMI_OOR in the DMAERR register. 0: This field is not masked in the DMAERR register 1: This field is masked in the DMAERR register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_EMI_OOR_M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit is a mask for DMA_EMI_OOR in the DMAERR register. 0: This field is not masked in the DMAERR register 1: This field is masked in the DMAERR register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_AXIERR_M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit is a mask for DMA_AXIERR in the DMAERR register. 0: This field is not masked in the DMAERR register 1: This field is masked in the DMAERR register

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CWDOGIRQ
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: AXI Master Port Watchdog Interrupt Requests Register Note: When the user clears a bit in the CWDOGIRQ register and a new one is set in the same cycle, this bit remains set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AXIWDOGV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI transactions did not complete before Watchdog threshold was reached. The output of this bit drives npmdma_wdog_viol_r.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Critical GVI accumulative indication. This bit is set when any of the allocated bits in CWDOGIRQ are set. The output of this bit drives DMAWDOG_V output signal. 0 : no error pending 1 : error pending

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMAERR_S
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Errors Shadow Register Access control by DMAACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_IMI_OOR_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writing 1 asserts DMA_IMI_OOR in the DMAERR register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_EMI_OOR_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writing 1 asserts DMA_EMI_OOR in the DMAERR register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_AXIERR_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writing 1 asserts DMA_AXIERR in the DMAERR register.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CWDOGIRQ_S
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: CWDOGIRQ Error Injection Register Access control by DMAACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AXIWDOGV_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert AXIWDOGV in the CWDOGIRQ register.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: WDOGACS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Watchdog control access registers

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDOG_ACS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables access to the watchdog registers. Every access to one of the watchdog control register must be preceded by writing the watchdog access code to this field. After the user writes the access code, the user must write to one of the watchdog registers. If another watchdog programming model register is written, then the user must rewrite the access code to write to WDOGCFG. The access code is 0xCE7A. watchdog rgisters are mapped from 0x1A0 to 0x1E0. This field is always read as 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: WDOGCFG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Watchdog control configuration register Access control by WDOGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AXI_WDOG_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables the DMA AXI port watchdog. Write access is enabled only when the WDOG_ACS field in the WDOGACS register is written with the access code.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: AXI_MPWDOGT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA AXI Master Port Watchdog Threshold Access control by WDOGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MPWDOGT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configures the watchdog threshold. Write access is permitted when the DMA master port watchdog is disabled.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: AXI_MPWDOGCNT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: The 32-bit value of the watchdog timer Access control by WDOGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MPWDOGCNT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The 32-bit value of the watchdog timer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_TASKID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task ID Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_TASKID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA Unit Task ID

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Capture registers bit mask for each register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: REG3P
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Capture registers bit mask for each register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Reserved
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Transfer size = {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} * ({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1). {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE}/{NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} must be an integer. If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} = Chunk Transfer size/({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups. BMAN_GRP, BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the DMA is using the BMAN. 0: Not using BMAN. 1: Using BMAN

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FLW_CTRL_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN flow control enable/disable. 0: Disabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are not used. The DMA can still send DMA status to the BMAN. 1: Enabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are used for flow control. The DMA sends DMA status to the BMAN.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CFG_COUNT_MAX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN or engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX value of assigned BMANs before starting a DMA transfer. Must be configured to 0 in V1.1 mode.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_DIR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indication to BMAN to increment or decrement its counters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups selection. BMAN_GRP, BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Do not send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. Must be configured to 0 in V1.1 mode.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_EXP_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine DMAs only: 0: Do not send expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send Expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. Must be configured to 0 in V1.1 mode.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between house keeping increment/decrement event. If {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK}=0, house keeping is not enabled.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Transfer size = NUM_BSIZE * (BSIZE+1). NUM_BSIZE/NUM_HK must be an integer. If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, NUM_BSIZE = Chunk Transfer size/(BSIZE+1)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN INC/DEC value.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CTRL0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WGHT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Select Weights processing: 00: WDM and WWTM are not used 01: WDM and WWTM 10: WWTM 11: WDM

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SU
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA writes to L1 memory through the SaRA unit 0: DMAr0 mode: SaRA bypassed 1: SaRA mode: SaRA writes to L1M Note: If the previous DMA task was configured for SaRA mode and the next task is to be configured for DMAr0 mode, you must set SaRA configuration GLModSel=1 in the next task to configure the SaRA glue logic.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MDM_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA Mode Configuration. 0: Single-DMA Mode 1: Multi-DMA Mode

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_HK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SAT Enable field. 0: SAT not enabled 1: SAT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SBT Enable field. 0: SBT not enabled 1: SBT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PCK_UNPCK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Pack and Unpack Selection 000: Pack and unpack disabled 001: Unpack every 2-bit value to 4-bit 010: Unpack every 4-bit value to 8-bit 011: Unpack every 8-bit value to 16-bit 100: Reserved 101: Pack every 8-bit value to 2-bit 110: Pack every 8-bit value to 4-bit 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ZSEXT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Zero or Sign-Extension Enable when data pack is selected in PCK_UNPCK. 00: Reserved 01: Zero extension 10: sign extension 11: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MBURST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum Burst Size. Defines the maximum burst size allowed for write or read transfers 0000: 1 transfer with incrementing addresses (INCR) 0001: 1 transfer with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0010: 2 transfers (INCR) 0011: 2 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0100: 4 transfers (INCR) 0101: 4 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 1000: 8 transfers (INCR) 1011: 16 transfers (INCR) 1100: 32 transfers (INCR) 1101: 64 transfers (INCR) 1110: 128 transfers (INCR) (128-bits and 256-bits wide AXI4 only) 1111: 256 transfers (INCR) (128-bits wide AXI4 only) Other values are reserved. Notes: 256 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 128 bits. 128 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 256 bits. If set to one of the FIXED transfer types, the task must be configured for one-dimensional DMA transfers.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MEM_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Memory Select Source Destination 000: Internal Memory - Internal Memory (IMI - IMI) (system DMA only) 001: Reserved 010: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) 011: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) with decompression 100: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) 101: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) with compression 110: Reserved 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Wait for end of ongoing DMA tasks before starting task. 0: Do not wait for ongoing tasks to end 1: Wait for ongoing tasks to end

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_EOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: End of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the end of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_SOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Start of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the start of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MESSAGE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Data transfer 1: Message transfer

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SAT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SAT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM Selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SBT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SBT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM Selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AWCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for write accesses: (AXI AWCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 0110: Write-through No-allocate 0110: Write-through Read-allocate 1110: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 0111: Write-back No-allocate 0111: Write-back Read-allocate 1111: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ARCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for read accesses: (AXI ARCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 1010: Write-through No-allocate 1110: Write-through Read-allocate 1010: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 1011: Write-back No-allocate 1111: Write-back Read-allocate 1011: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of bytes transferred between assertions of BMAN_INCDEC signal. See DTC_BMAN::BSIZE for more details.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CBN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Cluster Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Block Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Block Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CYC_BUF
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_SA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame start address extended address [39:32] field. If MEM_SEL=010, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA source address fields. Destination addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=100, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA destination address fields. Source addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=000, source and destination addresses are extended with 8'b0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_MULTIDMA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Multi-DMA Configuration Register. This register is applicable when Multi-DMA mode is configured (MDM_EN).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDM_DIR_BA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base address of the WDM compression directory in L2M. The address must be aligned to 64 B. The L2 base address is WDM_DIR_BA*64.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QLL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Configuration.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NOLMT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Overide. 0: QMAN cannot exceed load limit per QLL configuration 1: QMAN can exceed load limit per QLL configuration

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_MAFC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BASE_ADDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base Address for MAFC manual update. BASE_ADDR must point to a valid Tag.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size for MAFC manual update. SIZE must be configured to a legal value per the L1 memory size. BASE_ADDR and BASE_ADDR+SIZE must not wrap to the same L1 memory block. The number of Tags modified is SIZE+1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TAG_MODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1M TAG Operation Mode. 00: Automatic 01: Manual 10: Bypass 11: Automatic-Last - see also DTC_MAFC2::AUTO_LAST_MSK

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DIM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects the dimension at which the DMA executes a manual tag update. Manual tag update is performed regardless of TAG_MODE. Dimension refers to the source when reading from L1M and destination when writing to L1 memory. 000: The DMA does not perform a manual tag update. 001: Single Dimension. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of each single dimension. The tag update base addess is the tag indicated by the L1 block start address. The size is SIZE. 101: End of transfer. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of the transfer. The tag update base address is BASE_ADDR and size is SIZE. All other values: Reserved.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SETRST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit specifies whether the MAFC tag(s) should be set or reset. 0 : Reset Tag 1 : Set Tag

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_MAFC2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update #2 Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AUTO_LAST_MSK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies when Automatic-Last Tag operation mode is used when TAG_MODE is set to Automatic-Last. bit 0: End of Block : 1=Last Block in Cluster 0=Every Block in Cluster bit 1: End of Cluster : 1=Last Cluster in Frame 0=Every Cluster in Frame bit 2: End of Frame : 1=Last Frame in Multi-Frame 0=Every Frame in Multi-Frame bit 3: End of Multi-Frame : 1=Last Multi-Frame in Section 0=Every Multi-Frame in Section The end of dimension event where Automatic-Last is asserted is the event that satisfies all the conditions specified by AUTO_LAST_MSK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PRI_ABS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header PRI_ABS field. Sets the absolute priority. A higher value indicates a higher priority.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CHUNK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header CHUNK field. Sets the dimension on which tasks are fragmented. Ignored for message tasks. It is the responsibility of the user to specify a valid dimension. 0 = No fragmentation 1 = 1D 2 = 2D 3 = 3D 4 = 4D Others = Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CDU1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_MFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_FPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_CPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Cluster post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_BPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Block post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SSU_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SSU ID (extended SSU only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SBT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_CTRL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: COUNT_MAX_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If CFG_COUNT_MAX in DTC_BMAN is set, the QMAN/engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX of assigned BMANs to COUNT_MAX_VAL.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager group. The group number is from 0 to 7. A valid group must be specified. See BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DTYPE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - Data Type: 0 : Int8 1 : BF16 2 : FP32 3 : FP8 (2 types) 4 : FP4/FP6 5 : Int4 6 : FP16 7 : Int16 8 : Int32 9 : Fixed point and non-numeric Reserved : others

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DRND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - LSB to Round: 0 : Reserved 1-7 : LSB positions to mask before rounding Rounding of mantissa n in 2 stages: Add 2^(lsb-1)=1 leftshift(lsb-1) to n Mask lsb bits, i.e., n=n AND ~((1 leftshift(lsb))-1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CTRL1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Control Register #1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QWFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN does not send a new task from queue X to a DMA until tasks from queue X already issued to the DMAs have completed. Applicable to the first chunk only of a task.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_RDY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA_RDY specifies the DMA status required before a task enters arbitration. 0 = Reserved 1 = DMA Idle 2 = DMA Shadow Ready 3 = DMA Active A Ready

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_PL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The QMAN will assign the DMA task to the pool of DMAs specified by DMA_PL. DMA_PL[n] indicates that DMA[n] can be assigned.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AxQoS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI QoS Interface signals. For SoC use.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of the multi-cast master

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-cast slave enable. 0: The DMA is not a slave in a multi-cast group. 1: The DMA is a slave in a multi-cast group.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DEST_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of all slaves in the multi-cast group. DEST_ID[n]=0: NPM ID=n is not in the multi-cast group DEST_ID[n]=1: NPM ID=n is in the multi-cast group

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_ACT_DIV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Usually set to NUM_BSIZE/EXP_NUM_BSIZE but other values are supported. See specification. Must be an integer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: EXP_NUM_HK specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between expected house keeping increment/decrement event. If EXP_NUM_HK=0, house keeping is not enabled. The user must ensure EXP_NUM_HK less than or equal to EXP_NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, EXP_NUM_BSIZE = Chunk Transfer size/(BSIZE+1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: {BSIZE_MSB,BSIZE}+1 bytes transferred between assertions of BMAN_INCDEC signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups. BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the DMA is using the BMAN. 0: Not using BMAN. 1: Using BMAN

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FLW_CTRL_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN flow control enable/disable. 0: Disabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are not used. The DMA can still send DMA status to the BMAN. 1: Enabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are used for flow control. The DMA sends DMA status to the BMAN.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CFG_COUNT_MAX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN or engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX value of assigned BMANs before starting a DMA transfer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_DIR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indication to BMAN to increment or decrement its counters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups selection. BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Do not send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_EXP_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine DMAs only. 0: Do not send Expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send Expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between house keeping increment/decrement event. If {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK}=0, house keeping is not enabled.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Transfer size = {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} * ({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1). {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE}/{NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} must be an integer. If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} = Chunk Transfer size/({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN INC/DEC value.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CTRL1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Control Register #1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QWFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN does not send a new task from queue X to a DMA until tasks from queue X already issued to the DMAs have completed. Applicable to the first chunk only of a task.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_RDY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA_RDY specifies the DMA status required before a task enters arbitration. 0 = Reserved 1 = DMA Idle 2 = DMA Shadow Ready 3 = DMA Active A Ready

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_PL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The QMAN will assign the DMA task to the pool of DMAs specified by DMA_PL. DMA_PL[n] indicates that DMA[n] can be assigned.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AxQoS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI QoS Interface signals. For SoC use.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of the multi-cast master

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-cast slave enable. 0: The DMA is not a slave in a multi-cast group. 1: The DMA is a slave in a multi-cast group.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DEST_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of all slaves in the multi-cast group. DEST_ID[n]=0: NPM ID=n is not in the multi-cast group DEST_ID[n]=1: NPM ID=n is in the multi-cast group

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_ACT_DIV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Usually set to NUM_BSIZE/EXP_NUM_BSIZE but other values are supported. See specification. Must be an integer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: EXP_NUM_HK specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between expected house keeping increment/decrement event. If EXP_NUM_HK=0, house keeping is not enabled. The user must ensure EXP_NUM_HK less than or equal to EXP_NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, EXP_NUM_BSIZE = Chunk Transfer size/(BSIZE+1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CTRL0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WGHT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Select Weights processing: 00: WDM and WWTM are not used 01: WDM and WWTM 10: WWTM 11: WDM

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_STS_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MDM_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA Mode Configuration. 0: Single-DMA Mode 1: Multi-DMA Mode

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_STS_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_HK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SAT Enable field. 0: SAT not enabled 1: SAT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SBT Enable field. 0: SBT not enabled 1: SBT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SU
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA writes to L1 memory through the SaRA unit 0: DMAr0 mode: SaRA bypassed 1: SaRA mode: SaRA writes to L1M Note: If the previous DMA task was configured for SaRA mode and the next task is to be configured for DMAr0 mode, you must set SaRA configuration GLModSel=1 in the next task to configure the SaRA glue logic.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PCK_UNPCK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Pack and Unpack Selection 000: Pack and unpack disabled 001: Unpack every 2-bit value to 4-bit 010: Unpack every 4-bit value to 8-bit 011: Unpack every 8-bit value to 16-bit 100: Reserved 101: Pack every 8-bit value to 2-bit 110: Pack every 8-bit value to 4-bit 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ZSEXT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Zero or Sign-Extension Enable when data pack is selected in PCK_UNPCK. 00: Reserved 01: Zero extension 10: sign extension 11: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MBURST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum Burst Size. Defines the maximum burst size allowed for write or read transfers 0000: 1 transfer with incrementing addresses (INCR) 0001: 1 transfer with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0010: 2 transfers (INCR) 0011: 2 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0100: 4 transfers (INCR) 0101: 4 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 1000: 8 transfers (INCR) 1011: 16 transfers (INCR) 1100: 32 transfers (INCR) 1101: 64 transfers (INCR) 1110: 128 transfers (INCR) (128-bits and 256-bits wide AXI4 only) 1111: 256 transfers (INCR) (128-bits wide AXI4 only) Other values are reserved. Notes: 256 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 128 bits. 128 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 256 bits. If set to one of the FIXED transfer types, the task must be configured for one-dimensional DMA transfers.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MEM_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Memory Select Source Destination 000: Internal Memory - Internal Memory (IMI - IMI) (system DMA only) 001: Reserved 010: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) 011: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) with decompression 100: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) 101: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) with compression 110: Reserved 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Wait for end of ongoing DMA tasks before starting task. 0: Do not wait for ongoing tasks to end 1: Wait for ongoing tasks to end

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_EOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: End of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the end of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_SOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Start of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the start of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MESSAGE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Data transfer 1: Message transfer

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SAT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SAT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SBT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SBT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM Selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AWCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for write accesses: (AXI AWCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 0110: Write-through No-allocate 0110: Write-through Read-allocate 1110: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 0111: Write-back No-allocate 0111: Write-back Read-allocate 1111: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ARCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for read accesses: (AXI ARCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 1010: Write-through No-allocate 1110: Write-through Read-allocate 1010: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 1011: Write-back No-allocate 1111: Write-back Read-allocate 1011: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of bytes transferred between assertions of BMAN_INCDEC signal. See DTC_BMAN::BSIZE for more details.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CBN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Cluster Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Block Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Block Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_MAFC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BASE_ADDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base Address for MAFC manual update. BASE_ADDR must point to a valid Tag.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size for MAFC manual update. SIZE must be configured to a legal value per the L1 memory size. BASE_ADDR and BASE_ADDR+SIZE must not wrap to the same L1 memory block. The number of Tags modified is SIZE+1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TAG_MODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1M TAG Operation Mode. 00: Automatic 01: Manual 10: Bypass 11: Automatic-Last

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DIM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects the dimension at which the DMA executes a manual tag update. Manual tag update is performed regardless of TAG_MODE. Dimension refers to the source when reading from L1M and destination when writing to L1 memory. 000: The DMA does not perform a manual tag update. 001: Single Dimension. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of each single dimension. The tag update base addess is the L1 single dimension start address. The size is SIZE. 101: End of transfer. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of the transfer. The tag update base address is BASE_ADDR and size is SIZE. All other values: Reserved.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SETRST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit specifies whether the MAFC tag(s) should be set or reset. 0 : Reset Tag 1 : Set Tag

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_MAFC2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update #2 Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AUTO_LAST_MSK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies when Automatic-Last Tag operation mode is used when TAG_MODE is set to Automatic-Last. bit 0: End of Block : 1=Last Block in Cluster 0=Every Block in Cluster bit 1: End of Cluster : 1=Last Cluster in Frame 0=Every Cluster in Frame bit 2: End of Frame : 1=Last Frame in Multi-Frame 0=Every Frame in Multi-Frame bit 3: End of Multi-Frame : 1=Last Multi-Frame in Section 0=Every Multi-Frame in Section The end of dimension event where Automatic-Last is asserted is the event that satisfies all the conditions specified by AUTO_LAST_MSK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PRI_ABS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header PRI_ABS field. Sets the absolute priority. A higher value indicates a higher priority.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CHUNK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header CHUNK field. Sets the dimension on which tasks are fragmented. Ignored for message tasks. It is the responsibility of the user to specify a valid dimension. 0 = No fragmentation 1 = 1D 2 = 2D 3 = 3D 4 = 4D Others = Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CDU1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_MFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_FPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_CPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Cluster post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_BPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Block post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SSU_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SSU ID (extended SSU only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SBT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_CTRL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: COUNT_MAX_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If CFG_COUNT_MAX in DTC_BMAN is set, the QMAN/engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX of assigned BMANs to COUNT_MAX_VAL.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DTYPE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - Data Type: 0 : Int8 1 : BF16 2 : FP32 3 : FP8 (2 types) 4 : FP4/FP6 5 : Int4 6 : FP16 7 : Int16 8 : Int32 9 : Fixed point and non-numeric Reserved : others

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DRND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - LSB to Round: 0 : Reserved 1-7 : LSB postions to mask before rounding Rounding of mantissa n in 2 stages: Add 2^(lsb-1)=1 leftshift(lsb-1) to n Mask lsb bits, i.e., n=n AND ~((1 leftshift(lsb))-1)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager group. The group number is from 0 to 7. A valid group must be specified. See BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL fields.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CYC_BUF
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_SA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame start address extended address [39:32] field. If MEM_SEL=010, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA source address fields. Destination addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=100, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA destination address fields. Source addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=000, source and destination addresses are extended with 8'b0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_MULTIDMA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Multi-DMA Configuration Register. This register is applicable when Multi-DMA mode is configured (MDM_EN).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDM_DIR_BA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base address of the WDM compression directory in L2M. The address must be aligned to 64 B. The L2 base address is WDM_DIR_BA*64.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QLL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Configuration.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NOLMT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Overide. 0: QMAN cannot exceed load limit per QLL configuration 1: QMAN can exceed load limit per QLL configuration

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_UCSERR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Uncorrectable Safety Error Register Status register holding the DMA Uncorrectable safety errors. Access control by DMAACS. This register is part of the NPM safety support.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMAERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of DMAE field in the DMAERR register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: UCSERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set when any of the allocated events in the DMA_UCSERR register are set. The output of this bit drives DMAUCSERR output signal.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMAACS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Error Access Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBG_ACS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enable access to DBG shadow and DMA safety management registers. A write to the DBG shadow registers and a list of safety DMA management registers must be preceded by writing the access code to DMAACS. For a list of the protected safety management registers please refer to the safety section. Once the protected shadow or safety register is written, the user must again write the access code to DMAACS before writing to another of these register. The access code is 0xDAC5.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: WDM_MODE0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Compression Mode - Select which compression mode is used in the next layer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Compression Mode Select: 0000 - Reserved 0100 - Weight sharing 1000 - Sparse compression 1001 - 4/8 Bit Compression 1010 - Reserved 1100 - Weight sharing with weight sparsity Other - Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSHAR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Weight sharing - Input weight data width 000 - 2-bit input - 8-Bit output 001 - 3-bit input - 8-Bit output 010 - 4-bit input - 8-Bit output 011 - 5-bit input - 8-Bit output 100 - 2-bit input - 16-Bit output 101 - 3-bit input - 16-Bit output 110 - 4-bit input - 16-Bit output 111 - 5-bit input - 16-Bit output When using Weight sharing and weight sparsity the input weight data width is according to this field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSPAR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
Weight bitmask - Weight Structure 00 - Not Valid 01 - 8 bit weights 10 - 16 bit weights 11 - Not Valid
When using Weight sharing and weight sparsity the input weight data width is according to BSHAR field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BLSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Weight memory single buffer block size. This field is used to define the amount of weight data bytes allocated for both BUF0 and BUF1. This field must be configured with a number that is a multiple of 64 (BLSIZE[5:0]==0)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: WDM_MODE1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Compression Mode - Select which compression mode is used in the next layer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_WEIGHTS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of Weights field indicate the number of weights written to WMEM in the current layer transfer. This field must be configured with a number that is a multiple of 64 (NUM_WEIGHTS[5:0]==0)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: WDM_MODE2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Compression Mode - Select which compression mode is used in the next layer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BUF0_ADDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Weight Memory Buffer 0 Base address for next weight block. To avoid memory contentions, it is recommended to configure the buffer starting at BUF0_ADDR at block 0 of the weight memory and to configure the buffer starting at BUF1_ADDR at block 1 of the weight memory. This field must be configured with a number that is a multiple of 64 (BUF1_ADDR[5:0]==0)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: WDM_MODE3
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Compression Mode - Select which compression mode is used in the next layer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BUF1_ADDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Weight Memory Buffer 1 Base address for next weight block. To avoid memory contentions, it is recommended to configure the buffer starting at BUF0_ADDR at block 0 of the weight memory and to configure the buffer starting at BUF1_ADDR at block 1 of the weight memory. This field must be configured with a number that is a multiple of 64 (BUF0_ADDR[5:0]==0)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LOG_EV
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Logger Event Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Start of Transfer Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: End of Transfer Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multi-Frame Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFSOD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multi-Frame Start of Dimension Event. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_IMI_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Internal Memory Address Out of Range. Rising edge detect of DMAERR::DMA_IMI_OOR. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_EMI_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Address Out of Range. Rising edge detect of DMAERR::DMA_EMI_OOR. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_AXIERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI Bus Error. Rising edge detect of DMAERR::DMA_AXIERR. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AXIWDOGV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Watchdog Timeout. Rising edge detect of CWDOGIRW::AXIWDOGV. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SBT_TX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert DMA_SBT_TX on SBT sent to SSU. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SBT_ACK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert DMA_SBT_ACK on SBT Acknowledge receive from SSU. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SAT_TX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert DMA_SAT_TX on SAT sent to SSU. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PROF_CTL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: PROF CTL Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRCC_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Free Running Clock Counter Restart. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT0_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 0 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT1_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 1 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT2_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 2 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT3_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 3 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT4_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 4 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT5_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 5 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT6_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 6 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT7_RST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 7 reset. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT_CFG
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler Count Mode Configuration. 0: When unpaused, the counters count on every cycle (except in debug mode). 1: When unpaused, the counters count on every cycle (except in debug mode) that the profiler PROF_CNT_EN signal is asserted.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PROF_PAUSE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: PROF PAUSE Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRCC_PAUSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Free Running Clock Counter pause

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT0_PAUSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 0 pause

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT1_PAUSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 1 pause

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 3 pause

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT4_PAUSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 5 pause

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PROF_CNT7_PAUSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler counter 7 pause
