ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Transfer size = {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} * ({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1). {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE}/{NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} must be an integer. If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} = Chunk Transfer size/({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups. BMAN_GRP, BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the DMA is using the BMAN. 0: Not using BMAN. 1: Using BMAN

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FLW_CTRL_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN flow control enable/disable. 0: Disabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are not used. The DMA can still send DMA status to the BMAN. 1: Enabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are used for flow control. The DMA sends DMA status to the BMAN.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CFG_COUNT_MAX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN or engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX value of assigned BMANs before starting a DMA transfer. Must be configured to 0 in V1.1 mode.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_DIR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indication to BMAN to increment or decrement its counters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups selection. BMAN_GRP, BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Do not send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. Must be configured to 0 in V1.1 mode.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_EXP_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine DMAs only: 0: Do not send expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send Expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. Must be configured to 0 in V1.1 mode.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between house keeping increment/decrement event. If {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK}=0, house keeping is not enabled.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Transfer size = NUM_BSIZE * (BSIZE+1). NUM_BSIZE/NUM_HK must be an integer. If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, NUM_BSIZE = Chunk Transfer size/(BSIZE+1)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN INC/DEC value.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CTRL0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WGHT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Select Weights processing: 00: WDM and WWTM are not used 01: WDM and WWTM 10: WWTM 11: WDM

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SU
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA writes to L1 memory through the SaRA unit 0: DMAr0 mode: SaRA bypassed 1: SaRA mode: SaRA writes to L1M Note: If the previous DMA task was configured for SaRA mode and the next task is to be configured for DMAr0 mode, you must set SaRA configuration GLModSel=1 in the next task to configure the SaRA glue logic.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MDM_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA Mode Configuration. 0: Single-DMA Mode 1: Multi-DMA Mode

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_HK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SAT Enable field. 0: SAT not enabled 1: SAT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SBT Enable field. 0: SBT not enabled 1: SBT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PCK_UNPCK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Pack and Unpack Selection 000: Pack and unpack disabled 001: Unpack every 2-bit value to 4-bit 010: Unpack every 4-bit value to 8-bit 011: Unpack every 8-bit value to 16-bit 100: Reserved 101: Pack every 8-bit value to 2-bit 110: Pack every 8-bit value to 4-bit 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ZSEXT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Zero or Sign-Extension Enable when data pack is selected in PCK_UNPCK. 00: Reserved 01: Zero extension 10: sign extension 11: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MBURST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum Burst Size. Defines the maximum burst size allowed for write or read transfers 0000: 1 transfer with incrementing addresses (INCR) 0001: 1 transfer with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0010: 2 transfers (INCR) 0011: 2 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0100: 4 transfers (INCR) 0101: 4 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 1000: 8 transfers (INCR) 1011: 16 transfers (INCR) 1100: 32 transfers (INCR) 1101: 64 transfers (INCR) 1110: 128 transfers (INCR) (128-bits and 256-bits wide AXI4 only) 1111: 256 transfers (INCR) (128-bits wide AXI4 only) Other values are reserved. Notes: 256 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 128 bits. 128 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 256 bits. If set to one of the FIXED transfer types, the task must be configured for one-dimensional DMA transfers.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MEM_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Memory Select Source Destination 000: Internal Memory - Internal Memory (IMI - IMI) (system DMA only) 001: Reserved 010: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) 011: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) with decompression 100: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) 101: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) with compression 110: Reserved 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Wait for end of ongoing DMA tasks before starting task. 0: Do not wait for ongoing tasks to end 1: Wait for ongoing tasks to end

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_EOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: End of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the end of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_SOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Start of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the start of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MESSAGE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Data transfer 1: Message transfer

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SAT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SAT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM Selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SBT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SBT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM Selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AWCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for write accesses: (AXI AWCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 0110: Write-through No-allocate 0110: Write-through Read-allocate 1110: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 0111: Write-back No-allocate 0111: Write-back Read-allocate 1111: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ARCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for read accesses: (AXI ARCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 1010: Write-through No-allocate 1110: Write-through Read-allocate 1010: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 1011: Write-back No-allocate 1111: Write-back Read-allocate 1011: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of bytes transferred between assertions of BMAN_INCDEC signal. See DTC_BMAN::BSIZE for more details.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CBN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Cluster Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Block Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Block Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CYC_BUF
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_SA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame start address extended address [39:32] field. If MEM_SEL=010, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA source address fields. Destination addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=100, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA destination address fields. Source addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=000, source and destination addresses are extended with 8'b0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_MULTIDMA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Multi-DMA Configuration Register. This register is applicable when Multi-DMA mode is configured (MDM_EN).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDM_DIR_BA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base address of the WDM compression directory in L2M. The address must be aligned to 64 B. The L2 base address is WDM_DIR_BA*64.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QLL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Configuration.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NOLMT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Overide. 0: QMAN cannot exceed load limit per QLL configuration 1: QMAN can exceed load limit per QLL configuration

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_DMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_MAFC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BASE_ADDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base Address for MAFC manual update. BASE_ADDR must point to a valid Tag.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size for MAFC manual update. SIZE must be configured to a legal value per the L1 memory size. BASE_ADDR and BASE_ADDR+SIZE must not wrap to the same L1 memory block. The number of Tags modified is SIZE+1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TAG_MODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1M TAG Operation Mode. 00: Automatic 01: Manual 10: Bypass 11: Automatic-Last - see also DTC_MAFC2::AUTO_LAST_MSK

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DIM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects the dimension at which the DMA executes a manual tag update. Manual tag update is performed regardless of TAG_MODE. Dimension refers to the source when reading from L1M and destination when writing to L1 memory. 000: The DMA does not perform a manual tag update. 001: Single Dimension. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of each single dimension. The tag update base addess is the tag indicated by the L1 block start address. The size is SIZE. 101: End of transfer. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of the transfer. The tag update base address is BASE_ADDR and size is SIZE. All other values: Reserved.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SETRST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit specifies whether the MAFC tag(s) should be set or reset. 0 : Reset Tag 1 : Set Tag

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_MAFC2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update #2 Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AUTO_LAST_MSK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies when Automatic-Last Tag operation mode is used when TAG_MODE is set to Automatic-Last. bit 0: End of Block : 1=Last Block in Cluster 0=Every Block in Cluster bit 1: End of Cluster : 1=Last Cluster in Frame 0=Every Cluster in Frame bit 2: End of Frame : 1=Last Frame in Multi-Frame 0=Every Frame in Multi-Frame bit 3: End of Multi-Frame : 1=Last Multi-Frame in Section 0=Every Multi-Frame in Section The end of dimension event where Automatic-Last is asserted is the event that satisfies all the conditions specified by AUTO_LAST_MSK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PRI_ABS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header PRI_ABS field. Sets the absolute priority. A higher value indicates a higher priority.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CHUNK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header CHUNK field. Sets the dimension on which tasks are fragmented. Ignored for message tasks. It is the responsibility of the user to specify a valid dimension. 0 = No fragmentation 1 = 1D 2 = 2D 3 = 3D 4 = 4D Others = Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CDU1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_MFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_FPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_CPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Cluster post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_BPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Block post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_SSU_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SSU ID (extended SSU only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SBT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_CTRL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: COUNT_MAX_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If CFG_COUNT_MAX in DTC_BMAN is set, the QMAN/engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX of assigned BMANs to COUNT_MAX_VAL.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager group. The group number is from 0 to 7. A valid group must be specified. See BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DTYPE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - Data Type: 0 : Int8 1 : BF16 2 : FP32 3 : FP8 (2 types) 4 : FP4/FP6 5 : Int4 6 : FP16 7 : Int16 8 : Int32 9 : Fixed point and non-numeric Reserved : others

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DRND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - LSB to Round: 0 : Reserved 1-7 : LSB positions to mask before rounding Rounding of mantissa n in 2 stages: Add 2^(lsb-1)=1 leftshift(lsb-1) to n Mask lsb bits, i.e., n=n AND ~((1 leftshift(lsb))-1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_CTRL1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Control Register #1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QWFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN does not send a new task from queue X to a DMA until tasks from queue X already issued to the DMAs have completed. Applicable to the first chunk only of a task.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_RDY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA_RDY specifies the DMA status required before a task enters arbitration. 0 = Reserved 1 = DMA Idle 2 = DMA Shadow Ready 3 = DMA Active A Ready

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_PL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The QMAN will assign the DMA task to the pool of DMAs specified by DMA_PL. DMA_PL[n] indicates that DMA[n] can be assigned.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AxQoS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI QoS Interface signals. For SoC use.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of the multi-cast master

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-cast slave enable. 0: The DMA is not a slave in a multi-cast group. 1: The DMA is a slave in a multi-cast group.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DEST_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of all slaves in the multi-cast group. DEST_ID[n]=0: NPM ID=n is not in the multi-cast group DEST_ID[n]=1: NPM ID=n is in the multi-cast group

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_ACT_DIV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Usually set to NUM_BSIZE/EXP_NUM_BSIZE but other values are supported. See specification. Must be an integer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_BMAN_EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: EXP_NUM_HK specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between expected house keeping increment/decrement event. If EXP_NUM_HK=0, house keeping is not enabled. The user must ensure EXP_NUM_HK less than or equal to EXP_NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, EXP_NUM_BSIZE = Chunk Transfer size/(BSIZE+1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: {BSIZE_MSB,BSIZE}+1 bytes transferred between assertions of BMAN_INCDEC signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups. BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates that the DMA is using the BMAN. 0: Not using BMAN. 1: Using BMAN

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FLW_CTRL_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN flow control enable/disable. 0: Disabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are not used. The DMA can still send DMA status to the BMAN. 1: Enabled: the BMAN buffer ready and data ready inputs are used for flow control. The DMA sends DMA status to the BMAN.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CFG_COUNT_MAX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN or engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX value of assigned BMANs before starting a DMA transfer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_DIR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indication to BMAN to increment or decrement its counters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager groups selection. BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs are assigned to the DMA. Valid when BMAN_EN is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Do not send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send housekeeping on last handshake of transfer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAST_EXP_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine DMAs only. 0: Do not send Expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer. 1: Send Expected housekeeping on last handshake of transfer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between house keeping increment/decrement event. If {NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK}=0, house keeping is not enabled.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Transfer size = {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} * ({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1). {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE}/{NUM_HK_MSB, NUM_HK} must be an integer. If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, {NUM_BSIZE_MSB, NUM_BSIZE} = Chunk Transfer size/({BSIZE_MSB, BSIZE}+1).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN INC/DEC value.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CTRL1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Control Register #1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QWFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, the QMAN does not send a new task from queue X to a DMA until tasks from queue X already issued to the DMAs have completed. Applicable to the first chunk only of a task.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_RDY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA_RDY specifies the DMA status required before a task enters arbitration. 0 = Reserved 1 = DMA Idle 2 = DMA Shadow Ready 3 = DMA Active A Ready

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_PL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The QMAN will assign the DMA task to the pool of DMAs specified by DMA_PL. DMA_PL[n] indicates that DMA[n] can be assigned.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AxQoS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: AXI QoS Interface signals. For SoC use.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of the multi-cast master

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MCS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-cast slave enable. 0: The DMA is not a slave in a multi-cast group. 1: The DMA is a slave in a multi-cast group.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DEST_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM ID of all slaves in the multi-cast group. DEST_ID[n]=0: NPM ID=n is not in the multi-cast group DEST_ID[n]=1: NPM ID=n is in the multi-cast group

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_HK_INCDEC_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Expected House Keeping increment/decrement value.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_ACT_DIV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Usually set to NUM_BSIZE/EXP_NUM_BSIZE but other values are supported. See specification. Must be an integer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_HK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: EXP_NUM_HK specifies the number of increment/decrement indications to BMAN between expected house keeping increment/decrement event. If EXP_NUM_HK=0, house keeping is not enabled. The user must ensure EXP_NUM_HK less than or equal to EXP_NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXP_NUM_BSIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If task fragmentation by the Queue Manager is enabled, EXP_NUM_BSIZE = Chunk Transfer size/(BSIZE+1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CTRL0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WGHT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Select Weights processing: 00: WDM and WWTM are not used 01: WDM and WWTM 10: WWTM 11: WDM

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_STS_BMAN_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_BSIZE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MDM_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA Mode Configuration. 0: Single-DMA Mode 1: Multi-DMA Mode

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_HK_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: See DTC_STS_BMAN_HK_INCDEC_VAL::NUM_HK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SAT Enable field. 0: SAT not enabled 1: SAT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SBT Enable field. 0: SBT not enabled 1: SBT enabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SU
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA writes to L1 memory through the SaRA unit 0: DMAr0 mode: SaRA bypassed 1: SaRA mode: SaRA writes to L1M Note: If the previous DMA task was configured for SaRA mode and the next task is to be configured for DMAr0 mode, you must set SaRA configuration GLModSel=1 in the next task to configure the SaRA glue logic.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PCK_UNPCK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Pack and Unpack Selection 000: Pack and unpack disabled 001: Unpack every 2-bit value to 4-bit 010: Unpack every 4-bit value to 8-bit 011: Unpack every 8-bit value to 16-bit 100: Reserved 101: Pack every 8-bit value to 2-bit 110: Pack every 8-bit value to 4-bit 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ZSEXT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Zero or Sign-Extension Enable when data pack is selected in PCK_UNPCK. 00: Reserved 01: Zero extension 10: sign extension 11: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MBURST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maximum Burst Size. Defines the maximum burst size allowed for write or read transfers 0000: 1 transfer with incrementing addresses (INCR) 0001: 1 transfer with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0010: 2 transfers (INCR) 0011: 2 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 0100: 4 transfers (INCR) 0101: 4 transfers with fixed address (FIXED) (1D transfers only) 1000: 8 transfers (INCR) 1011: 16 transfers (INCR) 1100: 32 transfers (INCR) 1101: 64 transfers (INCR) 1110: 128 transfers (INCR) (128-bits and 256-bits wide AXI4 only) 1111: 256 transfers (INCR) (128-bits wide AXI4 only) Other values are reserved. Notes: 256 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 128 bits. 128 transfer INCR must not be used for an AXI bus width larger than 256 bits. If set to one of the FIXED transfer types, the task must be configured for one-dimensional DMA transfers.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MEM_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Memory Select Source Destination 000: Internal Memory - Internal Memory (IMI - IMI) (system DMA only) 001: Reserved 010: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) 011: External - Internal Memory (EMI - IMI) with decompression 100: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) 101: Internal Memory - External (IMI - EMI) with compression 110: Reserved 111: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WFEOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Wait for end of ongoing DMA tasks before starting task. 0: Do not wait for ongoing tasks to end 1: Wait for ongoing tasks to end

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_EOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: End of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the end of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: IRQ_SOT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Start of Transfer Interrupt Enable When set to high, the DMA generates an interrupt from the CDMA at the start of a task transfer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MESSAGE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0: Data transfer 1: Message transfer

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SAT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SAT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate which QMANs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate which NPM engine DMAs receive SAT. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SBT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SBT Synchronization Fields

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited. QMAN_GRP[y]=1 y=0,1..7, QMAN_SEL[x]=1 x=0,1..QMAN_SEL_SZ-1 selects queue QMAN_SEL_SZ*y+x. When 1 NPM engine is configured, QMAN_GRP[7:1] must be written as 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Queue Manager groups selection. QMAN_GRP and QMAN_SEL indicate from which QMANs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM Selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: DMA selection. NPM_NUM and DMA_SEL indicate from which NPM engine DMAs SAT is awaited. bit 0: DMAr0 bit 1: DMAr1 bit 2: DMAw bit 3: DMAr2 (if supported)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DSA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Current Address

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AWCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for write accesses: (AXI AWCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 0110: Write-through No-allocate 0110: Write-through Read-allocate 1110: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 0111: Write-back No-allocate 0111: Write-back Read-allocate 1111: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ARCACHE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: External Memory Cache Policy for read accesses: (AXI ARCACHE[3:0]) 0000: Device Non-bufferable 0001: Device Bufferable 0010: Normal Non-cacheable Non-bufferable 0011: Normal Non-cacheable Bufferable 1010: Write-through No-allocate 1110: Write-through Read-allocate 1010: Write-through Write-allocate 1110: Write-through Read and Write-allocate 1011: Write-back No-allocate 1111: Write-back Read-allocate 1011: Write-back Write-allocate 1111: Write-back Read and Write-allocate

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DBEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Element Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BSIZE_MSB
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of bytes transferred between assertions of BMAN_INCDEC signal. See DTC_BMAN::BSIZE for more details.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CBN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Cluster Element Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Block Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCBN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Block Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DFCN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Section Multiframe Frame Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DSMN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Section Multiframe Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Frame Number

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFCN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Cluster Number

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Source Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DBPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Current Task Destination Block Post-Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Block Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DCPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Cluster Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DCPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Cluster Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Frame Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Frame Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Source Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Source Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_DMFPM
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Task Destination Multiframe Post Modification Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Destination Multiframe Post-Modification

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_MAFC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BASE_ADDR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base Address for MAFC manual update. BASE_ADDR must point to a valid Tag.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size for MAFC manual update. SIZE must be configured to a legal value per the L1 memory size. BASE_ADDR and BASE_ADDR+SIZE must not wrap to the same L1 memory block. The number of Tags modified is SIZE+1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TAG_MODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1M TAG Operation Mode. 00: Automatic 01: Manual 10: Bypass 11: Automatic-Last

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DIM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects the dimension at which the DMA executes a manual tag update. Manual tag update is performed regardless of TAG_MODE. Dimension refers to the source when reading from L1M and destination when writing to L1 memory. 000: The DMA does not perform a manual tag update. 001: Single Dimension. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of each single dimension. The tag update base addess is the L1 single dimension start address. The size is SIZE. 101: End of transfer. The DMA performs a manual tag update at the end of the transfer. The tag update base address is BASE_ADDR and size is SIZE. All other values: Reserved.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SETRST
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This bit specifies whether the MAFC tag(s) should be set or reset. 0 : Reset Tag 1 : Set Tag

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_MAFC2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA MAFC Manual Tag Update #2 Register (NP-M Engine DMAs only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: AUTO_LAST_MSK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies when Automatic-Last Tag operation mode is used when TAG_MODE is set to Automatic-Last. bit 0: End of Block : 1=Last Block in Cluster 0=Every Block in Cluster bit 1: End of Cluster : 1=Last Cluster in Frame 0=Every Cluster in Frame bit 2: End of Frame : 1=Last Frame in Multi-Frame 0=Every Frame in Multi-Frame bit 3: End of Multi-Frame : 1=Last Multi-Frame in Section 0=Every Multi-Frame in Section The end of dimension event where Automatic-Last is asserted is the event that satisfies all the conditions specified by AUTO_LAST_MSK.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PRI_ABS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header PRI_ABS field. Sets the absolute priority. A higher value indicates a higher priority.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CHUNK
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L1QMAN Header CHUNK field. Sets the dimension on which tasks are fragmented. Ignored for message tasks. It is the responsibility of the user to specify a valid dimension. 0 = No fragmentation 1 = 1D 2 = 2D 3 = 3D 4 = 4D Others = Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CDU1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_MFPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_FPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Frame post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_CPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Cluster post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_BPM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Block post modification extended address [39:32] field.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_SSU_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: SSU ID (extended SSU only)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SAT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SAT.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SBT_ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Configure the SSU ID for SBT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_BMAN_CTRL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Transfer Buffer Control

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: COUNT_MAX_VAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If CFG_COUNT_MAX in DTC_BMAN is set, the QMAN/engine DMA will change the COUNT_MAX of assigned BMANs to COUNT_MAX_VAL.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DTYPE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - Data Type: 0 : Int8 1 : BF16 2 : FP32 3 : FP8 (2 types) 4 : FP4/FP6 5 : Int4 6 : FP16 7 : Int16 8 : Int32 9 : Fixed point and non-numeric Reserved : others

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FPFP_DRND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Floating Point Buffer Finger Print Control - LSB to Round: 0 : Reserved 1-7 : LSB postions to mask before rounding Rounding of mantissa n in 2 stages: Add 2^(lsb-1)=1 leftshift(lsb-1) to n Mask lsb bits, i.e., n=n AND ~((1 leftshift(lsb))-1)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Buffer Manager group. The group number is from 0 to 7. A valid group must be specified. See BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL fields.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_CYC_BUF
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: 40-bit address extension fields.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: EXTND_SA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Multi-frame start address extended address [39:32] field. If MEM_SEL=010, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA source address fields. Destination addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=100, the 8-bit address extension fields are appended to the DMA destination address fields. Source addresses are extended with 8'b0. If MEM_SEL=000, source and destination addresses are extended with 8'b0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DTC_STS_MULTIDMA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Multi-DMA Configuration Register. This register is applicable when Multi-DMA mode is configured (MDM_EN).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDM_DIR_BA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Base address of the WDM compression directory in L2M. The address must be aligned to 64 B. The L2 base address is WDM_DIR_BA*64.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QLL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Configuration.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NOLMT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: QMAN Queue Load Limit Overide. 0: QMAN cannot exceed load limit per QLL configuration 1: QMAN can exceed load limit per QLL configuration

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMA_UCSERR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Uncorrectable Safety Error Register Status register holding the DMA Uncorrectable safety errors. Access control by DMAACS. This register is part of the NPM safety support.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMAERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of DMAE field in the DMAERR register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: UCSERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set when any of the allocated events in the DMA_UCSERR register are set. The output of this bit drives DMAUCSERR output signal.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DMAACS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Error Access Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBG_ACS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enable access to DBG shadow and DMA safety management registers. A write to the DBG shadow registers and a list of safety DMA management registers must be preceded by writing the access code to DMAACS. For a list of the protected safety management registers please refer to the safety section. Once the protected shadow or safety register is written, the user must again write the access code to DMAACS before writing to another of these register. The access code is 0xDAC5.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: R1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable, Units: [], Valid Values: 0 - disable 1 - enable, Remarks: Request To Pause 0 Enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG0_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG1_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG2_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG3_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG4_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG5_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG6_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG7_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG8_R2PEN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine Request to Pause enable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: R1_RSRVD
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Override the Logger FIFO

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: R1_TS_CTL_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Timestamp registers enable

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: R2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid, Units: [], Valid Values: 0 - not valid 1 - valid, Remarks: Engine Debug Valid signal

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG0_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG1_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG2_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG3_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG4_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG5_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG6_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG7_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG8_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG9_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG10_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Engine debug valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GLO_DBGVAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: global debug valid status

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2MSS_TASKID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS Task ID Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2MSS_TASKID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L2MSS Task ID

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2MSS_SDCFG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS Software Configuration Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMA_EXTND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Selects the size of the DMA descriptor. 0: Up to V1.1. DMA task descriptor is compatible with NPMV1.1. 1: From V1.2. DMA task descriptor is extended to 128 bytes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SSU_EXTND
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Select the operation mode of the SSU: 0: Simple SSU (V1.1) 1: Extended SSU You must not configure SSU_EXTND=1 and DMA_EXTND=0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2M_MAP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description:
Select the L2M address mapping. This field must not be changed when there are accesses to the L2M. L2M_REMAP_MODE=0: L2M_MAP[2:0] Bandwidth across Blocks 000: 1 001: 2 010: 4 011: 8 L2M_MAP[5:3] Bandwidth in Block 000: 1 001: 2 010: 4 011: 8 All other values: Reserved
L2M_REMAP_MODE=1: L2M_MAP[2:0] Bandwidth across Blocks 000: 1 001: 2 010: 4 L2M_MAP[5:3] Bandwidth in Block 000: 1 001: 2 010: 4 011: 8 100: 16 All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2M_REMAP_MODE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Select the operation mode of the L2M Remap L2M_MAP. This field must not be changed when there are accesses to the L2M. 00: Mode 0 (V1.3) 01: Mode 1 (V1.4) 10: Reserved 11: Mode 1 (V1.4) plus remap with stride

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDM_CRC_HW
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: WDM_CRC_HW Indicates that there is Safety Summed CRC support in WDM block and it is Enabled.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDM_CRC_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: WDM_CRC_EN indicates that the Weight Chunks/Fragments of System DMA / WDM include SUMMED CRC32 code at the end of the Chunks/Fragments.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2MSS_GPOUT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: General Purpose Output Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: GPOUT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: General-purpose outputs.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CORE_VERSION
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: VERSION Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RTL_REVISION
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RTL revision Reset value: RTL revision Preliminary revisions contain ascending values - preliminary revision 0 contains the value 'h0, preliminary revision 1 contains the value 'h1, preliminary revision 2 contains the value 'h2, etc. The final revision contains the value 'hF.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RTL_VERSION
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: RTL version Reset value: RTL version For example for version v2.0.0 This field contains 'h200.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CORE_TYPE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Architecture type: BX1: 2021 BX2: 2022 XC16: 10016 SensPro: 0008 NP-M: TBD Reset value: Core Version.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2MSS_HDCFG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS Hardware Configuration Register Reset Value: All the bits in this register are configured during installation

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUMQ_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of queues per QMAN group: 00: 8 queues 01: 6 queues All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: npmAXI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM AXI Bus Width: 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_CONTROLLER_AXI
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM Controller AXI Bus Width: 10: 256 bits 11: 512 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BLK_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L2M number of blocks (V1.1 only): 0: 8 blocks 1: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2M_BLK_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L2M number of blocks: 0: 1 block 1: 2 blocks 2: 4 blocks All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of NPM: 000: 1 NPM 001: 2 NPMs 010: 4 NPMs 011: 8 NPMs All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2M_SIZE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: IDM size: 001: 1 MB 010: 2 MB 011: 4 MB 100: 8 MB 101: 16 MB 110: 32 MB 111: 6 MB Others : Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Safety
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Safety configured: 0: Safety not configured 1: Safety configured

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Profiler
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Profiler configured: 0: Profiler not configured 1: Profiler configured

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TO_MEM_LTNCY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of extra routing stage TO_MEMORY: 001: 1 010: 2 011: 3 100: 4 All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: FRM_MEM_LTNCY
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of extra routing stage FROM_MEMORY: 001: 1 010: 2 011: 3 100: 4 All other values: Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2MSS_HDCFG2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS Hardware Configuration Register Reset Value: All the bits in this register are configured during installation

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI0 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI1 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI2 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI3 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI4
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI4 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI5
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI5 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI6
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI6 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SysAXI7
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysAXI7 Bus Width: 00: Not configured 01: 128 bits 10: 256 bits All other values: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NumSysDMA
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of System DMAs configured. x: x=0,1 7: Number of DMAs is x+1 All other values: Reserved System AXI ports SysAXI0, SysAXI1...SysAXIx must also be configured.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NumWBM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of WDMs configured. x: x=0,1 7: Number of WDMs is x+1 All other values: Reserved System AXI ports SysAXI0, SysAXI1...SysAXIx and SysDMA0, SysDMA1...SysDMAx must also be configured.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2_WDOGACS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Watchdog control access registers

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDOG_ACS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables access to the watchdog registers. Every access to one of the watchdog control register must be preceded by writing the watchdog access code to this field. After the user writes the access code, the user must write to one of the watchdog register. If another watchdog programming model register is written, then the user must rewrite the access code to write to WDOGCFG. The access code is 0xCE7A.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2_WDOGCFG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: watchdog control configration register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYS_WDOG_EN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables the System watchdog; writing a 1 also resets the watchdog timer. Write access is enabled only when the WDOG_ACS field in the WDOGACS register is written with the access code.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SYS_WDOGMIN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: system watchdog minimum threshold

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDOGMIN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The minimum threshold is configured as 16xWDOGMIN. Write access is permitted when the SYS_WDOG_EN field in the WDOGCFG register is disabled

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SYS_WDOGMAX
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: system watchdog maximum threshold

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDOGMAX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The maximum threshold is configured as 16xWDOGMAX. Write access is permitted when the SYS_WDOG_EN field in the WDOGCFG registeris disabled

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SYS_WDOGCNT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: System watchdog timer

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDOGCNT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Contains the 32 MSBs of the watchdog timer. Timer count is 16xWDOGCNT.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: ENG_PD_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: The Power Domain Status of Engine x, x =0,1..NumEng-1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QC_STATE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Q-Channel Interface State 3'b000: Q_STOPPED 3'b010: Q_REQUEST 3'b011: Q_DENIED 3'b100: Q_EXIT 3'b110: Q_RUN 3'b111: Q_CONTINUE Others: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ENG_ACTIVE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates if an engine is active including VPU and VPU debug unit. 0: Engine is not active 1: Engine is active

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: TOP_PD_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: The Power Domain Status of L2MSS (including NPM Controller)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QC_STATE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Q-Channel Interface State 3'b000: Q_STOPPED 3'b010: Q_REQUEST 3'b011: Q_DENIED 3'b100: Q_EXIT 3'b110: Q_RUN 3'b111: Q_CONTINUE Others: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TOP_ACTIVE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates if the L2MSS (or NPM controller) is active including NPM controller debug unit. 0: L2MSS or NPM controller is not active 1: L2MSS or NPM controller is active

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2WDOGIRQ
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Critical Error Watchdog Interrupt Requests Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM7_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM7 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM7 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM6_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM6 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM6 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM5_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM5 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM5 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM4_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM4 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM4 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM3_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM3 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM3 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM2_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM2 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM2 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM1_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM1 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM1 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM0_WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM0 Critical Error Watchdog indication. Relay of NPM0 L1MSS L1WDOGIRQ::WNSE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA0_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA_WDOG_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA1_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA1 CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA1_WDOG_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA2_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA2 CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA2_WDOG_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA3_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA3 CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA3_WDOG_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA4_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA4 CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA_WDOG4_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA5_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA5 CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA5_WDOG_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA6_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA6 CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA6_WDOG_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA7_WDOG_V
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of sysDMA7 CWDOGIRQ::WNSE. The output of this bit drives SYSDMA_WDOG7_V output signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDOG_MIN
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: System watchdog was reset before the minimum threshold was reached. The output of this bit drives L2WDOG_MIN_V output signal. This is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to it.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WDOG_MAX
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: System watchdog was not reset before the maximum threshold was reached. The output of this bit drives L2WDOG_MAX_V output signal. This is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to it.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: WNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Critical exception accumulative indication. This bit is set when any of the allocated bits in L2WDOGIRQ are set. 0 : no error pending 1 : error pending

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2DMA_IRQ
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: DMA Interrupt Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DMAIRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data interrupt. This bit is set if any of the allocated bits in L2DMA_IRQ is set. 0 : No interrupt pending 1 : Interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMANDMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of OR of all QMANx_DMA_IRQ::QMANx_IRQ 0 : no QMAN interrupt pending 1 : QMAN interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA0_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of all SysDMA0 DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no SysDMA interrupt pending 1 : SysDMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA1_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of all SysDMA1 DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no SysDMA interrupt pending 1 : SysDMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA2_IRQ

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of all SysDMA4 DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no SysDMA interrupt pending 1 : SysDMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA5_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of all SysDMA5 DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no SysDMA interrupt pending 1 : SysDMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA6_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of all SysDMA6 DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no SysDMA interrupt pending 1 : SysDMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA7_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of all SysDMA7 DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no SysDMA interrupt pending 1 : SysDMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM0_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM0 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM1_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM1 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM2_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM2 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM3_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM3 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM4_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM4 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM5_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM5 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM6_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM6 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM7_DMA_IRQ
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of NPM7 L1MSS DMA_IRQ::DMAIRQ 0 : no NPM DMA interrupt pending 1 : NPM DMA interrupt pending

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NENSIRQ
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Normal Exceptions Interrupt Requests Register Note : When the user clears a bit in the NENSIRQ register and a new one is set in the same cycle, this bit remains set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maskable normal exception accumulative indication. This bit is set when any unmasked allocated bits in NENSIRQ are set. 0 : no error pending 1 : error pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_R_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication: L2MSS QMAN read address error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2HOST_W_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication: L2M Host Slave write error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2HOST_R_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication: L2M Host Slave read error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2DATA_W_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication: L2M Data Slave read error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2DATA_R_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication: L2M Data Slave write error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2CPM_W_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication: L2MSS CPM Slave write error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2CPM_R_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Error indication: L2MSS CPM Slave read error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM0_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM0 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM0 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM1_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM1 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM1 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM2_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM2 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM2 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM3_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM3 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM3 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM4_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM4 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM4 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM5_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM5 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM5 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM7_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM7 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM7 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NPM6_NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: NPM6 Normal Error indication. Relay of NPM6 NENSIRQ::NNSE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: D_CSERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Data Correctable Safety Errors accumulative indication.Set if any field in L2CSERR[30:1] is set. 0 : no error pending 1 : error pending

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CENSIRQ
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Critical Exception Interrupt Requests Register Note : When the user clears a bit in the CENSIRQ register and a new one is set in the same cycle, this bit remains set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Maskable critical exception accumulative indication. This bit is set when any unmasked allocated bits in CENSIRQ are set. 0 : no error pending 1 : error pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA_ERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: SysDMA Error Indication. Relay of OR of all SysDMAx DMAERR:DMAE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_WR_CNT_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Write Counter Error Indication. OR of all Bx_STATUS::EXP_WR_CNT_ERR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_RD_CNT_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN Read Counter Error Indication. OR of all Bx_STATUS::EXP_RD_CNT_ERR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_HDR_ERR

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: CEVANPM_DACU
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: DACU Registers. For all of the registers in this section, x is a number from 1 to DACU_NUM-1:

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DACU_VSTART0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Physical Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: REGIONX_START
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 4KB aligned start address. Start address of page X is REGIONX_START*4K. For page 0, REGIONX_START must be 0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INACTIVE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0 = This page is active.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DACU_PSTART0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Physical Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PSTART
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 20 LSBs of the physical page address. The virtual address VA[31:0] in DACU page X is translated to physical page address {{PP_EXT, PSTART} +(VA[31:12] -REGIONX_START), VA[11;0]}.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: ID. Reserved for future use.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DACU_PEXT0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Physical Page Address Extension Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PP_EXT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 32 MSBs of the physical page address.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DACU_VSTARTx
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Physical Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: REGIONX_START
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 4KB aligned start address. Start address of page X is REGIONX_START*4K. For page 0, REGIONX_START must be 0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INACTIVE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0 = This page is active. 1 = This page is inactive.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DACU_PSTARTx
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Physical Address Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 20 LSBs of the physical page address. The virtual address VA[31:0] in DACU page X is translated to physical page address {{PP_EXT, PSTART} +(VA[31:12] -REGIONX_START), VA[11;0]}.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ID
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: ID. Reserved for future use.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DACU_PEXTx
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Physical Page Address Extension Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: PP_EXT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 32 MSBs of the physical page address.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DBGACS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Error Access Control Register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: DBG_ACS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enable access to DBG shadow and L2MSS safety management registers. A write to the DBG shadow registers and a list of safety L2MSS management registers must be preceded by writing the access code to DBGACS. For a list of the protected safety management registers please refer to the npm safety manual. Once the protected shadow or safety register is written, the user must again write the access code to DBGACS before writing to another of these register. The access code is 0xDAC5.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2UCSERR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS Uncorrectable Safety Error Register Status register holding L2MSS uncorrectable safety errors. Access control by DBGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ECC_ERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Uncorrectable L2M ECC error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CRC_ERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Uncorrectable L2M CRC error. This field is a sticky bit and is cleared by writing 0 to this register field.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Critical functional exceptions. Set if any field in CENSIRQ[29:1] is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: UCSERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set if any of events in this register are set. The output of this bit drives L2UCSERR output signal.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2CSERR_S
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS Critical Ssafety Error Shadow Register L2MSS correctable error status injection into L2CSERR. Access control by DBGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ECC_COR_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Triggers an error, by setting ECC_COR in L2CSERR.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2UCSERR_S
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS UCS ERR Shadow Register L2MSS uncorrectable error status injection into L2UCSERR. Access control by DBGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ECC_ERR_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Triggers an error, by setting ECC_ERR in L2UCSERR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CRC_ERR_S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Triggers an error, by setting CRC_ERR in L2UCSERR

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2CSERR_M
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS Correctable Safety Error Mask Register Masks correctable L2MSS safety errors in L2CSERR. Access control by DBGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ECC_COR_M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: 0 : event enabled 1 : event masked

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CSERR_M
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Masks bit 0 in L2CSERR. If masked, the output interrupt npmL2MSS_safety_corr_int_r is not asserted, regardless if other bits in L2CSERR are set. 0 : bit and interrupt enabled 1 : bit and interrupt masked

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L2CSERR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS CS ERR Register Status register holding L2MSS correctable safety errors. Access control by DBGACS.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NNSE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Functional non-critical errors. Set if any field in NENSIRQ[29:1] is set.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ECC_COR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Correctable L2M ECC error.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CSERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set when any of the allocated unmasked events in this register are set. The output of this bit drives L2CSERR output signal. This bit in itself is masked by the respective bit in the L2CSERR_M register. When masked, the outgoing interrupt is not asserted. The mask does not affect the setting or clearing of the individual event bits.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SYSDMA_UCSERR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: L2MSS SYSDMA UCSERR Relay Register Note : This register is part of the NeuPro-M safety support

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: UCSERR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: OR of allocated fields in SYSDMA_UCSERR register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Relay of UCSERR in System DMA #1 UCSERR register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SYSDMA_ERR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2CPM_R_OOR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2CPM_W_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: CPM Slave Read Violation. Rising edge detect of NENSIRQ::L2CPM_W_OOR. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2HOST_R_OOR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2HOST_W_OOR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2DATA_R_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: L2M DATA Slave Read Violation. Rising edge detect of NENSIRQ::L2DATA_R_OOR. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L2DATA_W_OOR

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: QMAN_R_OOR

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: PRF_CNT_EV[x] is asserted on increment of Profiler Counter x. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_RD_CNT_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Rising edge detect of CENSIRQ::BMAN_RD_CNT_OOR. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_WR_CNT_OOR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Rising edge detect of CENSIRQ::BMAN_WR_CNT_OOR. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_INCDEC_EV
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN counter was changed. The BMANs and the counter events that assert BMAN_INCDEC_EV[x] event are specified in BMAN_LOG_SELx. This field is automatically cleared to 0 after one cycle.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: BMAN_LOG_SELx
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: BMAN Event #x Registerx=0,1,2,...7

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_NUM
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs assert event BMAN_INCDEC_EVx.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_SEL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicates which BMANs assert event BMAN_INCDEC_EVx.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_GRP
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: BMAN_NUM and BMAN_SEL indicate which BMANs are selected from BMAN_GRP.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_RDCNTINC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert event BMAN_INCDEC_EVx on BMAN read counter increment.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_RDCNTDEC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert event BMAN_INCDEC_EVx on BMAN read counter decrement.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_WRCNTINC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert event BMAN_INCDEC_EVx on BMAN write counter increment.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: BMAN_WRCNTDEC
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assert event BMAN_INCDEC_EVx on BMAN write counter decrement.
